member.name: T:Ekstrand.Net.HttpWebRequestExtension
member.summary: Allow for HTTP web request header section that are set by the system or set by properties or methods to be directly edited.

member.name: M:Ekstrand.Net.HttpWebRequestExtension.SetRawHeader(System.Net.HttpWebRequest,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Set the HTTP web request header values including restricted access headers values.
